page.title: 13TOURISM IN CARBOST
page.content: Tourism is very important to this area,creating seasonal work for local people and bringing trade.Tourists seem to be attracted to the area for different reasons.Some are attracted by the peace and tranquillity of the place, no noise, no pollution ,no crowds,no rushing!Others come for the beautiful scenery or to climb the mountains and explore the countryside.The local distillery also brings many others. Many of the villagers use the tourism as an opportunity to do a brisk business in the Bed and Breakfast trade ,supplementing their earnings for the quiet winter months ahead.
